Meteara's eyes suddenly glowed with a white and furious light.

Meteara: Stand down, you fool! I am neither a predacon nor a maximal. 
In fact, I am not even a cybertronian. I am Meteara, second Vok 
emissary! Fire just once at me and I swear that I will scatter your 
remains all over this Vector!

She transformed immediatly to her horrific beast mode. She looked like 
a metal four-legged predator with long serrated teeth and a machine 
gun on her back. Her tail was a bit like that of a scorpion, except 
that it ended with a pincer. Her size belied her true speed.

Meteara: And you are lucky too, Cybertronian! I am not here to 
fight... yet. I have come because of what you are trying to study.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Sunhawk instantly turned his pistol towards her and
> pressed the button to convert it into a rifle.  He
> pointed it directly at her forhead with his finger
> tight on the trigger, but not firing.
> 
> Sunhawk:  Listen Pred, I don't normally do this, but
> since we have important things to do I'm giving you a
> chance to walk away from here nice and slow.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > After entering the planet's atmosphere, Meteara took
> > her speed down in 
> > order to keep the landscape intact when she would
> > land. She was 
> > approaching the position of Kup and Sunhawk, and she
> > hoped she was not 
> > too late.
> > 
> > After a few minutes, she was visible to both of
> > them, but she stood 
> > hovering high in the air. Her arrival, though had
> > made much noise, so 
> > she was not totally unannounced.
> > 
> > 
> 
>
